# Ignore Unity-specific folders
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Uu]ser[Ss]ettings/
Packages/
# Ignore auto-generated Visual Studio/JetBrains Rider files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
# Ignore ML-Agents training results
results/
